MS MCQs

    Implement multilingual reports in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. How do you create a multilingual report?

      To display a report in the language of the user, you would use labels and the IncludeCaption property. To display a report in the language of the recipient, you would use the FieldCaption and TextConstants functions in the dataset.

      To display a report in the language of the recipient, you would use labels and the IncludeCaption property. To display a report in the language of the user, you would use the FieldCaption and the TextConstants functions in the dataset.

      Business Central isn’t multilingual; everything is always in English.

      A report can only be displayed in the language of the user. To print it in a different language, you need to change the language in the application and then print the report again.


    2. Where can a user change the language of the UI in Business Central?

      The language setting on the Role page

      The Country field on the Company Setup page

      The Language field on the My Settings page

      The country code on the User page
